page.title: 13The Motorway (M6)
page.content: The motorway is one of the main {transport}links in the area. Many different types of traffic use it, such as: cars, lorries, vans, motorbikes and caravans. There are three lanes on either side. The first southbound junction is to Lancaster, Morecambe and Kirkby Lonsdale. The first northbound junction is to Carnforth. When the motorway was built, they used the gravel from local quarries. People who have a long way to travel use the motorway. It does not bring problems to our everyday lives. From the school you can hear the traffic. There is a continuous buzzing all the time, but it does not bother us, even though our school is only two fields away from the motorway.
